    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Burning blue flames using methane gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brennende blaue Flammen mit Methangas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Flammes bleues brûlantes en utilisant le gaz de 
méthane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Flamas azuis ardentes usando o gás de methane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fiamme blu burning usando il metano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καίγοντας τις μπλε φλόγες που χρησιμοποιούν το μεθάνιο
αέριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Llamas azules ardientes usando el gas de metano</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Third in a series of four illustrations showing different uses of gases. Shown here is burning blue flames which uses methane gas.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">blue flames</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">burning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fuels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">methane</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Third in einer Reihe von vier Abbildungen, die 
unterschiedliche Gebräuche von Gasen zeigen. Hier dargestellt 
brennt blaue Flammen, welches Methangas benutzt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tiers dans une série de quatre illustrations 
montrant différentes utilisations des gaz. Montré ici brûle 
les flammes bleues ce qui utilise le gaz de méthane.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Third em uma série de quatro ilustrações que 
mostram usos diferentes dos gáses. Mostrado aqui está 
queimando flamas azuis qual usa o gás de methane.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terzo in serie di quattro illustrazioni che 
mostrano gli usi differenti dei gas. Indicato qui sta bruciando 
le fiamme blu quale usa il metano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρίτο σε μία σειρά τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που 
εμφανίζουν διαφορετικές χρήσεις των αερίων. Εμφανισμένος 
εδώ καίει τις μπλε φλόγες που χρησιμοποιεί το μεθάνιο αέριο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tercero en una serie de cuatro ilustraciones que 
muestran diversas aplicaciones de gases. Mostrado aquí se está
quemando las llamas azules cuál utiliza el gas de metano.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">blaue Flammen</string>
